title: Getting Started - OpenClaw
content: Fastest chat: open the Control UI (no channel setup needed). Run openclaw dashboard and chat in the browser, or open http://127.0.0.1:18789/ on the gateway host. Docs: Dashboard and Control UI.

title: OpenClaw Guide â€” Your Personal AI Assistant Made Simple
content: OpenClaw is an open-source AI assistant framework that connects Claude and other LLMs to your messaging apps. It runs locally on your machine and lets you interact with AI through WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, iMessage, and more.
